name: The Blue Star (Demo)
description:
Thousands of years into the future, the New Species of Crang are destroying the world, and there is only 1 thing to do but to fight.  Help the main character Rhys fight Crang and overpower the devils that stand in his path getting to the Blue Star. Travel the world, and travel through passages, caves, and dungeons to get to the Blue Star and help stop the chaos of the Crangs.

Credit to OOTA, AnnTenna, Maxim Grachev, El, WolK Xeneder, and Chronomantique for the music and some of the story.

Credit to PieEater on RPGMaker.Net for Aiden's sprite, portrait, and battle sprite.

I really do thank all of you for the credit.
